name.en: Lana the Holy Wind of Healing
name.ja: <ruby>癒<rt>いや</rt></ruby>しの<ruby>聖<rt>せい</rt></ruby><ruby>風<rt>ふう</rt></ruby>ラーナ

summoning_condition.en: You can Special Summon this card from your hand to your field in face-up Defense Position by sending 1 other card from your hand to the Graveyard.

requirement.en: During your Main Phase that you Normal or Special Summoned this card, send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Return 1 Spell/Trap Card from your opponent's field to the owner's hand. Then, you can change this card's battle position.
